languages.text: {n}Вокс Паскаля издает усталый хрип-смешок.{/n} "Брат Авель — гармоничен, а гармония — прекрасна. Что странного в том, чтобы защищать прекрасное от ужасов уродливого?"
{n}Pasqal's vox rasps a tired laugh.{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel is harmonious, and harmony is beauty. Is it so strange an urge to protect beauty from the horrors of the grotesque?"
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс Паскаля издает усталый хрип-смешок.{/n} "Брат Авель — гармоничен, а гармония — прекрасна. Что странного в том, чтобы защищать прекрасное от ужасов уродливого?"

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵装置中发出了疲惫的笑声。{/n}“技术兄弟亚伯是和谐的，而和谐就是美。我只是在保护美丽的东西免受怪诞的恐怖所害，这真的有那么奇怪吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox rasps a tired laugh.{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel is harmonious, and harmony is beauty. Is it so strange an urge to protect beauty from the horrors of the grotesque?"

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵装置中发出了疲惫的笑声。{/n}“技术兄弟亚伯是和谐的，而和谐就是美。我只是在保护美丽的东西免受怪诞的恐怖所害，这真的有那么奇怪吗？”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスが疲れたような笑い声を出す。{/n}「技術同胞アベルは調和の取れた存在です。そして調和とは美である。恐ろしくグロテスクなものから美を守るというのが、それほど奇妙なことなのでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox rasps a tired laugh.{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel is harmonious, and harmony is beauty. Is it so strange an urge to protect beauty from the horrors of the grotesque?"

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスが疲れたような笑い声を出す。{/n}「技術同胞アベルは調和の取れた存在です。そして調和とは美である。恐ろしくグロテスクなものから美を守るというのが、それほど奇妙なことなのでしょうか？」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le vox de Pasqal crache un rire fatigué.{/n} « Le technofrère Abel est harmonieux, et l'harmonie est synonyme de beauté. Est-ce un besoin si étrange de vouloir protéger la beauté contre les horreurs du grotesque ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox rasps a tired laugh.{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel is harmonious, and harmony is beauty. Is it so strange an urge to protect beauty from the horrors of the grotesque?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox de Pasqal crache un rire fatigué.{/n} « Le technofrère Abel est harmonieux, et l'harmonie est synonyme de beauté. Est-ce un besoin si étrange de vouloir protéger la beauté contre les horreurs du grotesque ? »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El voco de Pasqal emite una chirriante carcajada de cansancio.{/n} «El tecnohermano Abel es armonioso y la armonía es algo bello. ¿Le resulta tan extraño proteger lo bello de los horrores de lo grotesco?».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox rasps a tired laugh.{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel is harmonious, and harmony is beauty. Is it so strange an urge to protect beauty from the horrors of the grotesque?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco de Pasqal emite una chirriante carcajada de cansancio.{/n} «El tecnohermano Abel es armonioso y la armonía es algo bello. ¿Le resulta tan extraño proteger lo bello de los horrores de lo grotesco?».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Aus Pasqals Vox ertönt ein müdes Lachen.{/n} "Tech-Bruder Abel ist harmonisch und Harmonie bedeutet Schönheit. Ist es so seltsam, Schönheit vor den Schrecken des Grotesken schützen zu wollen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox rasps a tired laugh.{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel is harmonious, and harmony is beauty. Is it so strange an urge to protect beauty from the horrors of the grotesque?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus Pasqals Vox ertönt ein müdes Lachen.{/n} "Tech-Bruder Abel ist harmonisch und Harmonie bedeutet Schönheit. Ist es so seltsam, Schönheit vor den Schrecken des Grotesken schützen zu wollen?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksundan yorgun bir gülüş yükseliyor.{/n} "Tekno Kardeş Abel ahenklidir, ahenk de güzelliktir. Güzelliği, grotesk dehşetlerden koruma dürtüsü çok mu tuhaf?"
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox rasps a tired laugh.{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel is harmonious, and harmony is beauty. Is it so strange an urge to protect beauty from the horrors of the grotesque?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksundan yorgun bir gülüş yükseliyor.{/n} "Tekno Kardeş Abel ahenklidir ve ahenk güzelliktir. Güzelliği, grotesk dehşetlerden koruma dürtüsü çok mu tuhaftır?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
